title: is it legal to hunt or discharge a firearm from a public right of way or state maintained road in Brunswick, Columbus and New Hanover counties?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/11/is-it-legal-to-hunt-or-discharge-a-firearm-from-a-public-right-of-way-or-state-maintained-road/
